name: Brute_Melee.Fiery_Melee
display_help: Fiery Melee allows you to attack with fire, and even conjure up flaming melee weapons. Fiery Melee powers tend to set foes ablaze for added Damage Over Time.

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Scorch
powers.display_help: This power engulfs your hands in flames, and can ignite the target of your Scorching attack. Once on fire, the target will suffer damage over time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 3 ticks of 80.00% chance for 4.17 fire damage over 2.1s on target after 0.5s delay
3 ticks of 1.88 fire damage over 2.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Fire_Sword
powers.display_help: Through concentration, you can create a Sword of Fire that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 4.17 fire damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay
3 ticks of 1.88 fire damage over 2.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Combustion
powers.display_help: A slow but devastating attack. Cremate clobbers your foes with a massive 2 handed fiery smash that leaves your foe set on fire. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 4 ticks of 4.17 fire damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay
4 ticks of 1.88 fire damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Incinerate
powers.display_help: Intense concentration can allow you to Incinerate an opponent. This will set your foe ablaze, dealing very high damage over a short time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 10 ticks of 10.43 fire damage over 4.6s on target
10 ticks of 11.11 fire damage over 4.6s on target
10 ticks of 4.69 fire damage over 4.6s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunt foes to attack you. Useful to pull enemies off allies and keep them attacking you to raise your Fury. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -75.00% strength to range for 12s on target

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Breath_of_Fire
powers.display_help: This allows you to spew forth fire from your mouth, burning all foes within its narrow cone. This is a very accurate attack that can deal good damage at a close range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 15 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 2 ticks of 28.36 fire damage over 0.6s on target
4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 4.17 fire damage over 3.1s on target after 1s delay
2 ticks of 52.28 fire damage over 0.6s on target
2 ticks of 12.76 fire damage over 0.6s on target
4 ticks of 1.88 fire damage over 3.1s on target after 1s delay

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Fire_Sword_Circle
powers.display_help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing moderate damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 4.17 fire damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay
4 ticks of 1.88 fire damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Brute_Melee.Fiery_Melee.Greater_Fire_Sword
powers.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to create an enhanced Sword of Fire that can set foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Greater Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
